articles.title: Redmi 10 specs, renders leak: Redmi’s budget phone gets a 50MP camera - Android Authority
articles.description: Xiaomi's Redmi 10 has leaked online, and it looks like we've got at least two notable upgrades over last year's Redmi 9.
articles.content:
• Specs and renders of the Redmi 10 have leaked online.
  • The specs show a phone with a 90Hz display and a 50MP main camera.
  • Theres no word on pricing or availability right now.
